mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.serial_number, d.cat_id, c.cat_name, d.device_name, d.company, d.purchase_date FROM device d LEFT JOIN category c ON c.cat_id = d.cat_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device (serial_number, cat_id, device_name, company, purchase_date) VALUES (#{serialNumber}, #{catId}, #{deviceName}, #{company}, #{purchaseDate});
